thread.title: Snowpocalypse 2016/17 survivor
thread.title_full: Backcountry Gear reviewed by Snowpocalypse 2016/17 survivor

author: Snowpocalypse 2016/17 survivor
title: Snowpocalypse 2016/17 survivor
text: I found the 2 items I was looking for at very good prices compared to most other sites I searched. The packages arrived in a timely manner, considering here in Idaho we're in the midst of a Snowpocalypse! TIP: Helps to order while the storm is storming so the roads are clear when the package is being shipped. I will definitely be looking on this website for my future purchases to help me enjoy the outdoors. Thank you!
